required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ketamin Plus Propofol for Anesthesia Induction
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Ketamin+Propofol Mixture on Postoperative Recovery

brief_summary.textblock: ASA I-II 160 pediatric patients will recruit who underwent adenoidectomy-tonsillectomy surgery. Propofol 1 mg/kg + ketamin1 mg/kg (1/1 ratio) for group I; propofol 1,5 mg/kg + ketamin 0,75 mg/kg (2/1 ratio) for group II; propofol 2 mg/kg +ketamin 0,66 mg/kg (3/1 ratio) for group III; propofol 3 mg/kg will perform for anesthesia induction. General anesthesia will maintenance with sevoflurane 1-2% and O2/N2O mixture. Postoperative analgesia will provide with tramadol 2mg/kg IV at last 30 min of surgery. Extubation time, length of stay in PACU, PAED score, FLACC score, VAS score will record. Than all data will statistically analyse.

detailed_description.textblock: ASA I-II 160 pediatric patients will recruit who underwent adenoidectomy-tonsillectomy surgery in this randomised controlled study. The participants will divide into the 4 groups with computered random generation. The Different combination of propofol+ketamin mixture will apply at the induction of anesthesia. The groups will assign as group I,II, III and IV. Propofol 1 mg/kg + ketamin1 mg/kg (1/1 ratio) for group I; propofol 1,5 mg/kg + ketamin 0,75 mg/kg (2/1 ratio) for group II; propofol 2 mg/kg +ketamin 0,66 mg/kg (3/1 ratio) for group III; propofol 3 mg/kg will perform for anesthesia induction. Fentanyl 1 microgram per kg and rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg will apply for anesthesia induction to the all participants. General anesthesia will maintenance with sevoflurane 1-2% and O2/N2O mixture. Postoperative analgesia will provide with tramadol 2mg/kg IV at last 30 min of surgery. Extubation time, length of stay in PACU, PAED score, FLACC score, VAS score will record. Than all data will statistically analyse.

primary_outcome.description: The participants will observe in PACU till the Aldrete score will achieve 15. This duration of time will record.

secondary_outcome.description: PAED scores will record till the patient discharge from the PACU.

arm_group.description: Propofol 1 mg/kg + ketamin1 mg/kg (1/1 ratio) for group I to anesthesia induction.
propofol 1,5 mg/kg + ketamin 0,75 mg/kg (2/1 ratio) for group II to anesthesia induction
propofol 2 mg/kg +ketamin 0,66 mg/kg (3/1 ratio) for group III to anesthesia induction
propofol 3 mg/kg will perform for anesthesia induction

intervention.description: Different mixture of ketamin-propofol will apply for anesthesia induction.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ASA I-II patients
- Underwent adenoidectomy-tonsillectomy surgery
- Age between 3-12
Exclusion Criteria:
- ASA III-IV patients
- Age; under 3 years old
- Age; above 12 years old.
